description: Configuration schema for the webpack plugin

excludeFiles.description: Provide a glob for files to ignore

excludeRegex.description: Provide a regex to match files to ignore

keepOutputDirectory.description: Keep the output .webpack directory after packaging

concurrency.description: Desired concurrency, defaults to the number of available cores

serializedCompile.description: Backward compatible, this translates to concurrency: 1

packager.description: Packager that will be used to package your external modules

packagePath.description: Relative path to custom package.json file.

nodeModulesRelativeDir.description: relative path to current working directory.

forceExclude.description: The collection of modules that should not be bundled

forceInclude.description: The collection of modules that should definitely be bundled

lockFile.description: relative path to package-lock.json or yarn.lock

ignoreScripts.description: Do not execute package.json hook scripts on install

noInstall.description: Do not run npm install (assume install completed)

scripts.description: Scripts to run after installation, source:- https://github.com/serverless-heaven/serverless-webpack#custom-scripts

noNonInteractive.description: Disable interactive mode when using Yarn 2 or above

noFrozenLockfile.description: Do not require an up-to-date yarn.lock

networkConcurrency.description: Specify number of concurrent network requests
